original_text: Being therefore a prophet, and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him that he would set one of his descendants on his throne,
korean_text: 그는 선지자라 하나님이 이미 맹세하사 그 자손 중에서 한 사람을 그 위에 앉게 하리라 하심을 알고

sentences.original_text: God had sworn with an oath to him
that he would set one of his descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 자손 중 한 사람을 세우실 것이라는 것을
